attributes.action: We, the people undersigned, have no confidence in H.M.Government
attributes.additional_details: In addition, the disabled and the least well off in our society are being subjected to indignities that infringe upon their human rights. We, the people, signatories to this petition, have no confidence in the current government and demand that the Prime Minister informs the Queen that he wishes her to dissolve Parliament so that a fresh mandate can be granted by the electorate.
attributes.background: We believe that the UK Government is launching a direct and sustained attack on the people of our country. The austerity program is reducing the living standards of the majority of the UK population.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106407

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
